%i% tried to brag about when %SFDB_cool(i)%, but %r% was not impressed.

when %i% tried to make fun of %r% and completely failed

when %r% said not to going out with %i%
when %rp% serial monogamy got in the way when %i% asked %r% to date

Rule.name: Inititator must have done some cool action in the past
